test.name: Teste de LogIn Válido Estático - Caso Base

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=severest, url=http://localhost:3000/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '47', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "fulano@qa.com", "password": "teste"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Run Keyword And Continue On Failure
Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
Runs the keyword and continues execution even if a failure occurs.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
